title: Marvel Batteries – Corporate Website
description: Designed and developed a responsive corporate website using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. Implemented performance-optimized UI animations and interactive components. Improved user experience through mobile-first layouts and structured navigation.

title: Iyappa Foods – Business Management System
description: Developed frontend modules for business operations including orders, inventory, and reports. Built responsive web interfaces and a Flutter-based mobile application. Integrated REST APIs to fetch and display real-time business data.

title: SP Textiles – Textile Management Software
description: Developed software modules for inward and outward inventory management. Created Flutter-based mobile UI for stock monitoring and reporting.

title: Zengraf – Business Management System
description: Designed and implemented UI for customer, vendor, employee, and job order management. Used Bootstrap and custom CSS to ensure consistency and scalability.
